content:
I'd be happy to help you prioritize your work tasks.

To get started, can you please share the tasks you need to prioritize? You can list them out, and I'll help you categorize them based on their urgency and importance.

You can use the following format to share your tasks:

Task 1: [insert task name]
Deadline: [insert deadline or timeframe]
Description: [briefly describe the task]

Task 2: [insert task name]
Deadline: [insert deadline or timeframe]
Description: [briefly describe the task]

...and so on.

Once you share your tasks, I'll help you prioritize them using the Eisenhower Matrix, which categorizes tasks into four quadrants:

**Urgent & Important (Do First)**
**Important but Not Urgent (Schedule)**
**Urgent but Not Important (Delegate)**
**Not Urgent or Important (Delete)**

Let's get started!
